"Play my favorite CD": Create a personalized CD playlist based on the user's music preferences and favorite songs.
"CD creation tool": Develop a tool that allows users to create their own CDs by selecting songs from their music library and customizing the cover art.
"CD burner": Create a portable CD burner that can be attached to a smartphone or laptop, allowing users to burn CDs on the go.
"CD scanner": Develop a scanner that can scan CDs and convert them into digital files, allowing users to store their music library on their computer or phone.
"CD-ROM emulator": Create an emulator that allows users to play CD-ROM games on their computer or phone, bringing back the nostalgia of old-school gaming.
